content: प्रहरणं {@--1@} Striking, beating. {@--2@} Casting, throwing. {@--3@} Assailing, attacking. {@--4@} Hurting. {@--5@} Removing, expelling. {@--6@} A weapon, missile; या (उर्वशी) सुकुमारं प्रहरणं महेंद्रस्य <ls>V. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 73</ls>; <ls>Mk. 5. 12</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>Māl. 8. 9.</ls> {@--7@} War, battle, fight. {@--8@} A covered litter or car. {@--9@} The box of a carriage.
